inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 62, "index": 21}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 3, "index": 25}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 30}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 54, "index": 39}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 32, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft white stained glass, I need to craft white dye first. White dye requires a lily of the valley. Since I don't have that, I will smelt the red sand at slot 10 to get a lily of the valley in slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 10 to slot 11 with quantity 1
